ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Get to Know Me
ABOUT.INTRO: Hello! I'm Abderrazzaq El Abdouni, a passionate Full Stack Engineer with expertise in web development, IoT, and machine learning.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: With a strong background in both frontend and backend technologies, I enjoy creating efficient, scalable, and user-friendly applications. I'm constantly learning and exploring new technologies to stay at the forefront of the rapidly evolving tech landscape.
ABOUT.NAME: Abderrazzaq El Abdouni
ABOUT.AVAILABILITY: Available for freelance or full-time positions
ABOUT.BIO: I am a passionate Full Stack Engineer based in Rabat, specializing in web development, IoT, and Machine Learning. I combine technical expertise and innovation to create high-performance, scalable software solutions.

AI_CHAT.TITLE: Building an AI Chat Application with Python
AI_CHAT.EXCERPT: Learn how to create a modern chat application powered by artificial intelligence using Python and natural language processing.
AI_CHAT.CONTENT: In this comprehensive guide, we'll explore the process of building an AI-powered chat application from scratch. We'll cover everything from setting up the development environment to implementing natural language processing and creating an intuitive user interface. The article includes code examples, best practices, and tips for optimizing your AI chat application.

FACE_RECOGNITION.TITLE: Implementing Face Recognition in IoT Devices
FACE_RECOGNITION.EXCERPT: A practical guide to implementing face recognition technology in IoT devices using Python and OpenCV.
FACE_RECOGNITION.CONTENT: This article dives deep into the world of face recognition technology and its implementation in IoT devices. We'll discuss the challenges of running face recognition on resource-constrained devices, optimization techniques, and security considerations. The guide includes practical examples and code snippets to help you implement face recognition in your own IoT projects.

CLOUD_ARCHITECTURE.TITLE: Modern Cloud Architecture Patterns
CLOUD_ARCHITECTURE.EXCERPT: Explore the latest cloud architecture patterns and best practices for building scalable applications.
CLOUD_ARCHITECTURE.CONTENT: In this article, we'll examine modern cloud architecture patterns and how they can be applied to build scalable, resilient applications. We'll cover microservices, serverless architecture, containerization, and more. The guide includes real-world examples and practical advice for implementing these patterns in your projects.
